1.title: Our HORRORible Pilot

episode of.title: Roxsy Tyler's House of Horrors (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: It's been awhile since Roxsy Tyler and her partner Chuck were last seen hosting some sad science fiction movies on the "Carnival of Horrors". A new plan is in motion to get the two horror personalities back into the spot light-- a documentary about their lives outside of the carnival! Within the first moments of it's incarnation, the SHOCKumentary quickly becomes a more problematic idea than it does a profitable one. We are also introduced to Roxsy Tyler's team! Polly, her fan club president and social media advisor, Roxsy's greedy and stern manager, and also Roxsy's ...

2.title: Date Night of the Damned

episode of.title: Roxsy Tyler's House of Horrors (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: It's that time of the month... No! Not "that" time of the month! It's Roxsy Tyler and Mr. Potent's monthly "date night". As Roxsy endures the romance, Count Chuckula receives word that his Mother is popping for a visit and that her expectations of him will be high in realms of love and ... well, adulthood altogether. To create the illusion that Chuck is engaged and has his life together in front of his dear Mother-- Chuck plucks a random young woman from a hair salon and forces her to pose as his girlfriend.

3.title: Killer Reviews

episode of.title: Roxsy Tyler's House of Horrors (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: Manager gets Roxsy Tyler a gig reviewing Independent Horror Films on her own webcast but as he should have expected... Roxsy quickly makes him regret the decision. Meanwhile, Count Chuckula's well of female victims are drying up when he discovers the charismatic new killer, "Dorian McMichael". Chuck obsesses about finding ways to out-do his new arch rival.

4.title: Ladies Fright Night

episode of.title: Roxsy Tyler's House of Horrors (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: The Manager receives feedback that Roxsy Tyler has been deemed "highly insensitive towards women". In order to get Roxsy Tyler more acclimated to her female fan base he forces her to host a sex toy party at her house. Count Chuckula experiments with "zombie snacks" and puts it out to the universe that he is looking for his "horror movie virgin".

5.title: Roxsy's Anger Problem

episode of.title: Roxsy Tyler's House of Horrors (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: It becomes apparent not just at home but also at work that Roxsy Tyler's anger problem has gotten out of control. Before anyone gets hurt; Manager decides that it's time for Polly to take Roxsy on a yoga retreat to help calm her nerves. Count Chuckula joins in just to see some "sweet meats" in yoga pants but it turns out "relaxing" doesn't mean the same for Roxsy Tyler as it does to any normal human being.

6.title: Joyride

episode of.title: Roxsy Tyler's House of Horrors (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: When "Stalker" arrives to operate camera for another day of "House of Horrors" he spots a police officer at Roxsy's front door. Not long after he dives and hides in the bushes-- Count Chuckula knocks him out and decides to take him on a joyride!

7.title: Roxsy Tyler: Nemesis

episode of.title: Roxsy Tyler's House of Horrors (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: Roxsy Tyler deems it unfair that Count Chuckula has a nemesis and decides she needs to seeks one out on her own. It becomes a lot harder than Roxsy imagines especially with a so-called "Super Fan" getting in her way.

8.title: Dread N' Buried

episode of.title: Roxsy Tyler's House of Horrors (TV Series 2017– )

8.plot: Roxsy and Chuck's friendship gets tested when they have to hide a body together.

9.title: House of Halloween #1

episode of.title: Roxsy Tyler's House of Horrors (TV Series 2017– )

9.plot: It's All Hallow's Eve! The one night the dead can walk among the living and... boy, do they ever! The souls Chuck's "ex-girlfriends" come back to haunt him on this night but there's a little confusion as to whether he's crazy or if Roxsy is just pretending she doesn't see them. Roxsy Tyler suddenly realizes that Christina, who killed herself in Roxsy's bathroom and is now her "life coach", can leave the bathroom and party with them on this night! Multiple problems present themselves during a party Roxsy throws that night but that won't stop her and Chuck from having ...

imdb.plot outline: In what started out as a documentary about Horror Hosting Programs quickly becomes an episodic SHOCKumentary about two narcissistic personalities who have no problem with the world watching their daily grind of murder and mayhem. See exactly what happens when Roxsy Tyler and Count Chuckula leave the Carnival of Horrors and go home to the House of Horrors.
imdb.title: Roxsy Tyler's House of Horrors
